author: iSazonov
body:
We need to add new Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.NetAnalyzers rules 
See https://github.com/dotnet/runtime/commit/72ff0df4638ced1cc2b15c92c055f842c51e32d2

/cc @xtqqczze

comments.author: xtqqczze
comments.body: I think we should take a different approach to dotnet/runtime#53158 and add the rules in a separate PR. We can enable any rules later.

comments.author: msftbot[bot]
comments.body:

title: Add new analyzer rules
